block.formulaText:
cms.PageExp.Local(
    "data",
    cms.DataExp.QueryList("
        select a.oid ,a.name,a.code,count(b.oid) as count from OA_NewsType_H a left join OA_NewsType_H b  on a.oid=b.parentid where a.oid<>-1 and a.parentid =0  group by  a.oid ,a.name,a.code order by a.code
    ")
)
&cms.PageExp.Local(
    "data2",
    cms.DataExp.QueryList("
        select a.oid ,a.name,a.code,a.parentid ,count(b.oid) as count from OA_NewsType_H a left join OA_NewsType_H b  on a.oid=b.parentid 
where a.parentid  in (select oid from OA_NewsType_H where  oid<>-1 and parentid =0 )
 group by  a.oid ,a.name,a.code,a.parentid order by a.code
    ")
)
&cms.PageExp.Local(
    "data3",
    cms.DataExp.QueryList("
        select a.oid ,a.name,a.code,a.parentid ,count(b.oid) as count from OA_NewsType_H a left join OA_NewsType_H b  on a.oid=b.parentid 
where a.parentid  in (select oid from OA_NewsType_H where  parentid  in (select oid from OA_NewsType_H where  oid<>-1 and parentid =0 ))
 group by  a.oid ,a.name,a.code,a.parentid order by a.code
    ")
)
